title: Mobile Self-regulated Second Language Acquisition Program Tailored for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Operating a real-time feedback system using smartphone-based learning analytics tools, including weekly goal setting and self-assessment activities.

learning_goals: Learners can independently establish and execute a daily 30-minute+ language learning plan via a mobile app.
Learners can identify at least three weekly language usage error patterns based on learning analytics data and develop improvement strategies.
Learners can achieve over 80% accuracy when presenting role-plays using 20 advanced vocabulary terms acquired in real-time video classes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
